Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Enemy forces have been spotted in THE PIT.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Don't worry, it's just a nickname for the lower parking level. University's president calls it a natural habitat.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: I think he just doesn't want to fix the giant hole.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: The Parking Office is further away. We think Redline is trying to sneak through and end things quickly. That sounds like something she would do.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Your goal is to take out these units. You've been given a Senior to lead the Juniors. Let's go!
